entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the external identity is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'ExternalIdentity' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the external identity is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.
